item.title: yemeni jets bomb al qaeda-held city
item.description: at least 30 people were killed in yemen after military jets pounded a southern town held by al qaeda and troops opened fire on demonstrators demanding an end to president ali abdullah saleh's nearly 33-year rule.

item.title: yemen protesters urged not to raise bin laden banners

item.description: marion bartoli turned the pressure of playing at her home grand slam into a driving force on tuesday as she became the first frenchwoman to reach the roland garros semi-finals since 2005.

item.title: consumer agency tests simpler mortgage forms

item.description: japan has told the u.n. nuclear watchdog radioactivity was being released "directly" into the atmosphere from the site of an earthquake-stricken reactor and that it had put out a fire at a spent fuel storage pond there.
